        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-axis coordinate of the start point of the line
        y1 - The y-axis coordinate of the start point of the line
        x2 - The x-axis coordinate of the end point of the line
        y2 - The y-axis coordinate of the end point of the line
        px - The x-axis coordinate of the point
        py - The y-axis coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        The distance

      • atan

        public static double atan​(double x0,
                          double y0,
                          double x,
                          double y)
        Returns the theta component of a point or a vector, in polar coordinates. The value is normalized in the range [0,2*PI]
        Parameters:
        x0 - The x-axis coordinate of the start point
        y0 - The y-axis coordinate of the start point
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the end point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the end point
        Returns:
        The theta component of a point or a vector, in polar coordinates

                             double y,
                             double angle)
        Rotates a point by an angle
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the point
        angle - The angle (in radians)
        Returns:
        The rotated point

        public static double ripple​(double value,
                            double min,
                            double max,
                            double ripple)
        Generates a ripple around a value
        Parameters:
        value - The value
        min - The minimum allowed value
        max - The maximum allowed value
        ripple - The ripple (in the range [0,1])
        Returns:
        The rippled value
